sentences.en: Do we really have to invite all my insufferable relatives to the wedding?
sentences.cn: 我们真得请我那些叫人难以忍受的亲戚们来参加婚礼 吗 ?
他很讨厌，真令人受不了。

sentences.en: He was insufferable at times — self-centred and narcissistic.
sentences.cn: 他有时让人难以容忍——自我中心，自我陶醉。

sentences.en: His behavior and carriage were insufferable as he showed me my duties.
sentences.cn: 他指点我做事时的举动和架势,使我受不了.

sentences.en: His insufferable insolence cost him many friends.
sentences.cn: 他那令人难以容忍的蛮横态度使他失掉了许多朋友.

sentences.en: I do not want to include Lisa in the wedding party; she is insufferable.
sentences.cn: 我不想让丽莎参加婚礼招待会, 她令人难以接受.

sentences.en: I suppose I shall have to include my insufferable relatives in the wedding party.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我得把那些令人难以忍受的亲戚也都请到婚宴上.

sentences.en: If you can master this simple tool, you'll be the insufferable know - it - all in your crew.
sentences.cn: 如果你能掌握这个简单的工具, 你会变成那个让人“不堪忍受”的万事通.

sentences.en: The heat and humidity were insufferable.
sentences.cn: 高温和潮湿让人难以忍受。

sentences.en: Your dear insufferable, Beatrice is finally doing something useful - fertilizing the vegetables at the Summer Palace.
sentences.cn: 你亲爱的,令人忍无可忍的, 比阿特丽斯终于做了一件有益的事情 —— 为夏宫的蔬菜施肥.

trans.tran_cn: 难以忍受的，令人不能容忍的
trans.tran_en: If you say that someone or something is insufferable, you are emphasizing that they are very unpleasant or annoying
